Question.Subject: How do I get my Dailybooth photos and tweets onto my blog?
Question.Content:
So I did this before, a while back. I had a gadget on my blog on Blogger where my most recent Dailybooth photo would show up. I had a separate gadget where my most recent tweets would show up. I redesigned my blog and now I can't figure out what I did before! And help is greatly appreciated. I feel like there is a really obvious solution I'm missing. :-/ Thanks much, Tanner! I now know where the widgets are for Twitter (under Goodies at the bottom of the homepage).
I still want to know about Dailybooth, though!
Question.ChosenAnswer: If you go to twitter and gadgets section, I believe it has an html code on how to put tweets on your blog.

Answer.Content: If you go to twitter and gadgets section, I believe it has an html code on how to put tweets on your blog.
